snippet.title: Sparkball - Gameplay Highlights #1
snippet.description:
Let's play some Sparkball!

We're happy to release a glimpse at some of our recent internal test sessions. The game is more fun than ever and continues to improve week after week! Keep an eye out for #2 coming soon!

What is Sparkball?
Sparkball often described as "League of Legends meets Rocket League", is a unique ‘Mobrawler’ that combines the action combat of a brawler with the endless depth of a MOBA to create an unforgettable experience that grips you match 1 and keeps you engaged at match 10,000. It’s madcap mayhem with depth, strategy, team spirit… and a chicken wizard named Roostandor! 

Two teams square off in our Dunktown arena. Here they’ll chase, capture, and pass a mysterious ball and attempt to score in their opponent’s goal. However secondary objectives, unique character abilities, and purchasable items can tip the balance of power in a heartbeat. 

Want to play Sparkball?
We're hosting an Early Access weekend expected to take place in late May. We'll be announcing the various ways to get an early access key in the coming weeks, so be sure to join http://discord.gg/SparkadiaGG and follow us on at twitter at http://twitter.com/SparkadiaGG to be notified the moment they become available!

What is Sparkadia?
Sparkadia is an ecosystem of interconnected games developed by Worldspark Studios, a superstar team of AAA developers whose prior credits include League of Legends, World of Warcraft, Overwatch, Halo, Destiny, Fortnite, etc.

Links:
Website: http://sparkadia.gg/
More info: http://explore.sparkadia.gg/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/SparkadiaGG
Telegram: http://t.me/SparkadiaGG
Discord: http://discord.gg/SparkadiaGG
